price: Yeroma isheen dhuftu sireen kee akka kanaa jedhame, Isheenis “inni akkuma waan isaati” jette. [Suleymaanis] “dura ishee beekumsa kennamnee, Muslimtoota taaneerra” (jedhe).
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتۡ قِيلَ أَهَٰكَذَا عَرۡشُكِۖ قَالَتۡ كَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَۚ وَأُوتِينَا ٱلۡعِلۡمَ مِن قَبۡلِهَا وَكُنَّا مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāat qīla ahākadhā ʿarshuki qālat ka-annahu huwa waūtīnā al-ʿil'ma min qablihā wakunnā mus'limīna
